reviewText:
Here you are, Denise. I hope the following list of episodes in this 5-tape collection helps. Unfortunately, I have them from other tape sets. The content still deserves a 5-star rating:
- High Noon at Mayberry - The Loaded Goat
- The Big House - A Wife for Andy
- Andy Discovers America - Andy's English Valet
- The Mountain Wedding - Opie and the Spoiled Child
- Ralf Hollister Sings - Class Reunion
It would be nice to know which episodes are included on this collection.  I am trying to buy them for my husband and I want to get as many different episodes as I can.
